title: Lengths
text: The length of the leg opposite of A is $$a=4$$, the length of the leg adjacent to A is $$b=5.7$$, and the length of the hypotenuse is $$c=7$$.
speech: The length of the leg opposite of A is  a is equal to 4 , the length of the leg adjacent to A is  b, is equal to 5.7 , and the length of the hypotenuse is  c, is equal to 7 .
